ing: 1 (15 ounce) can light red kidney beans, drained and rinsed
1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed
des: "Enjoy the fresh flavors of summer's best in every bite of this easy, colorful salad!"
ins: In a large bowl, gently toss beans, corn, onion, tomatoes, lime juice, and lemon zest. Drizzle with olive oil, and season with salt and pepper. Mix in basil just before serving.
